IBaseSearchConfig - A search space to be used for recognition

Sub types:
  • "type": "static", see IStaticSearchConfig
  • "type": "dynamic", see IDynamicSearchConfig

A search space to be used for recognition

Key Name Value Type Required? Documentation
"type": String, one of "static", "dynamic" yes Select the sub-type.
inline keys from sub-type { IStaticSearchConfig } depends Required if and only if "type": "static".
inline keys from sub-type { IDynamicSearchConfig } depends Required if and only if "type": "dynamic".
"name": String no The name of the search space.
"connection": [ { IBaseConnectionConfig } ] no Configures connections of the search spaces.
"search_filter": { ISearchFilterConfig } no Configures search filters of the search spaces.
"language_model": [ { ILanguageModelConfig } ] no Configures language models of the search spaces.
"vocon_parameters": { IVPSearchConfig } no VoCon parameters related to search spaces
"consolidated_update": { IConsolidatedUpdateConfig } no Configures consolidated update for search spaces that have consolidated update buffer.

Details:

"name":

The name of the search space.

This can be used as an alias to identify the search space in the result. If given, this name will show up instead of the search space filename.

The name is also used to trigger a search space merge if it follow a specific schema (SearchName/merge=MergeName). In this case, during the recognition all search spaces that has the same MergeName will be merged together.

"connection":
Configures connections of the search spaces.
"search_filter":
Configures search filters of the search spaces.
"language_model":
Configures language models of the search spaces.
"vocon_parameters":
VoCon parameters related to search spaces
"consolidated_update":
Configures consolidated update for search spaces that have consolidated update buffer.

IDynamicSearchConfig - Specifies a dynamically generated search space

Super type: IBaseSearchConfig

Specifies a dynamically generated search space

A dynamic search space is generated by a dynamic content consumer. The application using this search space will take care to wait for completion of the respective DCC.

Key Name Value Type Required? Documentation
"name":
String
no
The name of the search space.
This property is inherited from IBaseSearchConfig.
"connection":
[ { IBaseConnectionConfig } ]
no
Configures connections of the search spaces.
This property is inherited from IBaseSearchConfig.
"search_filter":
{ ISearchFilterConfig }
no
Configures search filters of the search spaces.
This property is inherited from IBaseSearchConfig.
"language_model":
[ { ILanguageModelConfig } ]
no
Configures language models of the search spaces.
This property is inherited from IBaseSearchConfig.
"vocon_parameters":
{ IVPSearchConfig }
no
VoCon parameters related to search spaces
This property is inherited from IBaseSearchConfig.
"consolidated_update":
{ IConsolidatedUpdateConfig }
no
Configures consolidated update for search spaces that have consolidated update buffer.
This property is inherited from IBaseSearchConfig.
"dynamic_content_consumer":
String
yes
This property supports vh_callback.
"search_name":
String
yes
This property supports vh_callback.
"source":
[ String ]
no
This property supports vh_callback.

Details:

"name":

The name of the search space.

This can be used as an alias to identify the search space in the result. If given, this name will show up instead of the search space filename.

The name is also used to trigger a search space merge if it follow a specific schema (SearchName/merge=MergeName). In this case, during the recognition all search spaces that has the same MergeName will be merged together.

"connection":
Configures connections of the search spaces.
"search_filter":
Configures search filters of the search spaces.
"language_model":
Configures language models of the search spaces.
"vocon_parameters":
VoCon parameters related to search spaces
"consolidated_update":
Configures consolidated update for search spaces that have consolidated update buffer.
"dynamic_content_consumer":
Name of the dynamic content consumer that produces this search space.
"search_name":
The name of the search space as specified inside the DCC.
"source":
The name(s) of the source(s) that identifies the source(s) (e.g. device name) of the dynamic data. If there are multiple sources for Fuzzy Match DCC then all the search spaces that correspond to the source will be merged before recognition. If there are multiple sources for List Context DCC and this configuration has a host search space configuration, then a container search space will be created to which each source is added as guest search space. Container search space itself will be added as a guest search space to the host search space

IStaticSearchConfig - This specifies a static Search Space

Super type: IBaseSearchConfig

This specifies a static Search Space

A static Search Space is a Search Space that is pre-compiled offline and put on disk.

It is important to note that the keys filename and file_path are mutually exclusive. The user should only specify one of them. If both are specified, the priority will go to the file_path.

Additional constraint: The following properties are mutually exclusively required: file_name, file_path

Key Name Value Type Required? Documentation
"name":
String
no
The name of the search space.
This property is inherited from IBaseSearchConfig.
"connection":
[ { IBaseConnectionConfig } ]
no
Configures connections of the search spaces.
This property is inherited from IBaseSearchConfig.
"search_filter":
{ ISearchFilterConfig }
no
Configures search filters of the search spaces.
This property is inherited from IBaseSearchConfig.
"language_model":
[ { ILanguageModelConfig } ]
no
Configures language models of the search spaces.
This property is inherited from IBaseSearchConfig.
"vocon_parameters":
{ IVPSearchConfig }
no
VoCon parameters related to search spaces
This property is inherited from IBaseSearchConfig.
"consolidated_update":
{ IConsolidatedUpdateConfig }
no
Configures consolidated update for search spaces that have consolidated update buffer.
This property is inherited from IBaseSearchConfig.
"file_name":
String
see “Additional constraint”
The name on disc of the Search Space to load. It is a required field in case the file_path key is not provided
This property supports vh_callback.
"file_path":
String
see “Additional constraint”
The absolute path (including the filename) of the Search Space to load. It is a required field in case the filename key is not provided
This property supports vh_callback.
"do_crc_check": String, one of "true" and "false" no, default value is “true” Do CRC check for this Search Space.

Details:

"name":

The name of the search space.

This can be used as an alias to identify the search space in the result. If given, this name will show up instead of the search space filename.

The name is also used to trigger a search space merge if it follow a specific schema (SearchName/merge=MergeName). In this case, during the recognition all search spaces that has the same MergeName will be merged together.

"connection":
Configures connections of the search spaces.
"search_filter":
Configures search filters of the search spaces.
"language_model":
Configures language models of the search spaces.
"vocon_parameters":
VoCon parameters related to search spaces
"consolidated_update":
Configures consolidated update for search spaces that have consolidated update buffer.
"file_name":
The name on disc of the Search Space to load. It is a required field in case the file_path key is not provided
"file_path":
The absolute path (including the filename) of the Search Space to load. It is a required field in case the filename key is not provided
"do_crc_check":

Do CRC check for this Search Space.

Default is true.

IAsrInputConfig - This specifies a asr input for application

Super type: IBaseInputConfig

This specifies a asr input for application

Key Name Value Type Required? Documentation
"name":
String
no
The name of the application input.
This property is inherited from IBaseInputConfig.
"dccs_to_wait_for": [ { IDccToWaitForConfig } ] no List of dynamic content consumer to wait for before starting the recognition.
"search": [ { IBaseSearchConfig } ] yes A list of search spaces to recognize against.

Details:

"name":
The name of the application input.
"dccs_to_wait_for":

List of dynamic content consumer to wait for before starting the recognition.

The key is optional. If not specified, the recognition will start with data available at that point.

"search":

A list of search spaces to recognize against.

Various search spaces types are supported, including SLM, grammars and Fuzzy Match.

IApplicationConfig - Configuration which includes application specific information

Configuration which includes application specific information

Key Name Value Type Required? Documentation
"name": String yes The name of the application.
"input": [ { IBaseInputConfig } ] no The list of inputs of this application.
"output": [ { IBaseOutputConfig } ] no The list of outputs of this application.
"nlu": [ { IBaseNluConfig } ] no the list of nlu nodes of this application
"post_processor": [ { IPostProcessorConfig } ] no the list of post processors of this application

Details:

"name":
The name of the application.
"input":

The list of inputs of this application.

configure different types of Application inputs (ASR, Cloud)

"output":

The list of outputs of this application.

configure different types of Application outputs (internalAudio so far)

"nlu":

the list of nlu nodes of this application

configure different NLU nodes for NLU processing.

"post_processor":

the list of post processors of this application

configure different post processors for result processing.

ISem3AppConfig - A sem3 app

A sem3 app

It is important to note that the keys filename and file_path are mutually exclusive. The user should only specify one of them. If both are specified, the priority will go to the file_path.

Additional constraint: The following properties are mutually exclusively required: file_name, file_path

Key Name Value Type Required? Documentation
"name": String no The name of the sem3 context.
"file_name":
String
see “Additional constraint”
The name on disc of the sem3 app to load. It is a required field in case the file_path key is not provided
This property supports vh_callback.
"file_path":
String
see “Additional constraint”
The absolute path (including the filename) of the sem3 app to load. It is a required field in case the filename key is not provided
This property supports vh_callback.
"additional_data": [ { ISem3AdditionalDataConfig } ] no  

Details:

"name":

The name of the sem3 context.

This will mainly used to add/remove data at runtime.

"file_name":
The name on disc of the sem3 app to load. It is a required field in case the file_path key is not provided
"file_path":
The absolute path (including the filename) of the sem3 app to load. It is a required field in case the filename key is not provided

"additional_data":

ISem3AdditionalDataConfig -

Key Name Value Type Required? Documentation
"name": String no the name of the sem3 additional data. This is an alias mainly used when adding/removing data at runtime.
"path":
String
yes
Path
This property supports vh_callback.
"configuration": { ISem3AdditionalDataConfigurationConfig } no  
"data": [ { ISem3DataConfig } ] no  

Details:

"name":
the name of the sem3 additional data. This is an alias mainly used when adding/removing data at runtime.
"path":

Path

A data path is a combination of a unique annotator identifier, optionally with one or more data receiver identifier, For example, “AnnotatorId/dataReceiverId1” and “AnnotatorId/dataReceiverId2”. “/merge” is a interenal name used exclusively for data merging purpose, shouldn’t appear in configuration.

"configuration":

"data":
